author: jsign
content:
Yep, we're waiting for the sequencer fix. Looks like that bug gets triggered on long waiting times. I also used this client (for obv reasons? ha) for my contribution and didn't get the problem. But it it was quite early and only had 2hs of waiting time.
(thx for the support btw)
